title: Digital Learning-Based Nursing Practice Competency Strengthening Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing practice knowledge and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Mobile learning environment setup for practicing nurses via smartphone-based platforms, providing digitally delivered practical training content

learning_goals: Learners can complete weekly digital nursing education content (two modules) via LMS with over 80% completion rate
Learners can analyze three or more nursing practice scenarios using digital learning tools and propose problem-solving approaches
Learners can achieve an average score of 75 or higher after participating in ten formative assessment quizzes in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
